attributes.action: Cut ALL MP's wages/perks/allowances and pensions including any committees they may be on to bring them inline with the majority of other public sector workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the governments of this country implement higher taxes and reduce spending and therefore services are affected but seldom if ever do they implement significant cuts or restraints on themselves - it is about time we the public decided what our politicians are worth and it is about time the politicians took notice and did as we the electorate wish – reduce their total income and pension to that of the average public sector worker -  if they don’t like the wages and benefits then they can always get a different job
